metadata.title: CVE-2021-4156 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds read flaw was found in libsndfile's FLAC codecfunctionality. An attacker who is able to submit a specially crafted file(via tricking a user to open or otherwise) to an application linked withlibsndfile and using the FLAC codec, could trigger an out-of-bounds readthat would most likely cause a crash but could potentially leak memoryinformation that could be used in further exploitation of other flaws.

criterions.comment: libsndfile: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
